exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : olist (A:=A) ltM p /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p Cq : olist (A:=A) ltM q /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q Unable to unify "reduceplus ?M2170 ?M2171 ?M2172 ?M2173 ?M2175 ?M2176 ?M2177 ?M2178 ?M2180 ?M2181 ?M2182 ?M2183 ?M2185 (pX ?M2186 ?M2188) (pX ?M2187 ?M2189)" with "Relation_Operators_compat.Desc (mon n) ltM (fP A n (spolyf p q Cp Cq))".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) p, q : list (Term A n) Cp : olist (A:=A) ltM p /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) p Cq : olist (A:=A) ltM q /\\ nZterm A0 eqA (n:=n) q Unable to unify "reduce ?M2170 ?M2171 ?M2172 ?M2173 ?M2175 ?M2176 ?M2177 ?M2178 ?M2180 ?M2181 ?M2182 ?M2183 ?M2185 ?M2188 ?M2189" with "(fix F (l : list (Term A n)) : (fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l := match l as l0 return ((fun _ : list (Term A n) => Prop) l0) with | nil => True | y :: l0 => (fun (a : Term A n) (_ : list (Term A n)) (Rec : Prop) => Rec /\\ ~ zeroP A0 eqA (n:=n) a) y l0 (F l0) end) (spolyf p q Cp Cq)".
Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros p q Cp Cq. unfold canonical in Cp, Cq. destruct Cp as [Hp1 [Hp2 [Hp3 Hp4]]]. destruct Cq as [Hq1 [Hq2 [Hq3 Hq4]]]. unfold canonical. repeat split. - apply reduceplus_skip. auto. - apply reduce_inv; auto. - apply reduceplus_mults; auto. - apply reduce_mults; auto.
